## entries() function

Returns a two dimensional array of the entries of a map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function entries<T1, T2>(map: Map<T1, T2>): [T1, T2][];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | <code>Map&lt;T1, T2&gt;</code> | the map to get the entries of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`[T1, T2][]`

an array of the entries of the map
